channel.title: Infinite HP/Spec
channel.description: I'd like to give myself infinite HP with a perfect ring. I got the bonuses so I rape with hitting my max .. Constantly. I'd also like inf spec/prayer/run energy.

item.title: Infinite HP/Spec
item.dc:creator: @DesiDre DesiDre
item.description:
@DesiDre wrote:

special is in your char file, prayer is in your char file , run is in your char file.

to make a ring give you 50000 bonus or something youll need to go into item.cfg and go from there. pretty self explanatory.

Read full topic
